Tools modify it to enable Addons in the game
But how does the game with mods work on such a server?

Before starting the game:
1. Enable Addons
2. Go to the game's main menu (mods are already loaded at this point)
3. Disable Addons (the gameinfo file is restored to its original state)
Tools do not see my addons!
Check the addons/workshop folder\nIf there are no .vpk files, subscribe to Addons in Steam and enter the game to download them
Addons do not work in the game
You may have forgotten to select and enable them BEFORE entering the game (this is important)\nTry again and re-enter the game

After specifying the game folder, tools search for a folder named addons/workshop\nAnd extract Addons information from .vpk files\nIf this folder does not exist, you can create it and place .vpk files inside

After selecting mods and clicking "Enable Addons",
tools create copies of your .vpk files (cache) to integrate them into the game
They will be activated the next time the game starts
You can clear this cache, which will delete copies of the files in addons/workshop/id_Addons
If you specified the wrong game folder path or the gameinfo.txt file was modified and is no longer restoring,\nyou can reset the tools settings in the settings menu and verify the game cache in Steam
